participant_1.background:
I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep.
I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous.
my favorite band is nightwish.
I'm a homebody, but I love my kids!
my favorite food is pasta.

participant_2.background:
I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
i want to be alone sometimes.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
my children are mostly grown.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just got back from the grocery store. How was your day?
It was good, I'm getting ready to move to a new city.
Oh, that's exciting! Why are you moving?
I'm moving closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds like a great reason to move! I love antique stores.
Me too! I'm also excited to be closer to my friends and family.
That's great! I'm sure you'll miss your old city, but I'm sure you'll love your new one too.
I'm sure I will! I'm excited for this new chapter in my life.
That's great to hear! I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
You're welcome! So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to go to concerts and read books.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of genres, but I especially love historical fiction and thrillers.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon and the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about Outlander, but I haven't read it yet. I've read Pillars of the Earth and it was great!
It's a great series! I'm excited to see what they do with the TV show.
Me too! I've heard good things about it.
I'm sure it will be great.
I hope so
